Description: Handmade ceramic jar with medium slightly flared neck, widening to a globular body and round base. Embellished with smoothed, punctate impressions on rim and incised decoration elsewhere, featuring an incised rhomboidal pattern along the lower neck, an incised band with triangles around the neck join, and an incised rhomboidal patter in two sets of three spaced around the body. Several firing stains on exterior.
